title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 13, ch. III, pt. 52 - Procedural Regulations Governing Hearings Held Under The New York Theatre Ticket Distribution Act
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 13, ch. III, pt. 52 - Procedural Regulations Governing Hearings Held Under The New York Theatre Ticket Distribution Act

State Regulations
§ 52.1 - Scope of part
§ 52.2 - Opportunity to be heard
§ 52.3 - Notice of hearing
§ 52.4 - Service of notice of hearing, orders and other communications
§ 52.5 - Personal appearance; representation by attorney
§ 52.6 - Hearing officers; assignment of hearings
§ 52.7 - Hearings to be public; stenographic record of hearings
§ 52.8 - Application for adjournment
§ 52.9 - Amendment of notice of hearing
§ 52.10 - Conduct of hearing; powers of hearing officer
§ 52.11 - Opportunity to testify and cross-examine; issuance of subpoenas
§ 52.12 - Interrogatories
§ 52.13 - Oral argument; briefs
§ 52.14 - Hearing officer's report; exceptions to report
§ 52.15 - Final determination made by the attorney general
§ 52.16 - Petition to reopen hearing
§ 52.17 - Orders of the attorney general

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 13, ch. III, pt. 52

Statutory authority: Arts and Cultural Affairs Law, art. 23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
